original_title: Chicueyi Cuicatl: Ocho Cantos en Náhuatl
overview: A voice traverses time in a single day, from birth and childhood, and the joys of maturity, to resignation in the face of death. The first Mexican musical in Náhuatl and with historical native instruments.
title: Chicueyi Cuicatl: Ocho Cantos en Náhuatl
